events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising.
The application has been successfully categorized under the engineering department to begin the recruitment process.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to manage the screenings and coordinate upcoming interviews.
The initial phone screening with the candidate went well; they demonstrated strong knowledge in software development.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled with senior engineers for the candidate next week.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview showing strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Following the technical round, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed and the candidate displayed excellent communication and alignment with company values.
A formal job offer was proposed to the candidate including salary and benefits, awaiting their response.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, expressing intent to accept pending final discussions.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, completing all initial paperwork and orientation sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed with the candidate successfully hired and integrated into the engineering department.
